Belgium eID middleware SDK - C++ API Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
eIDMW::BEID_BiometricAbstract base class for the biometric documents
eIDMW::BEID_ByteArrayThis class is used to receive/pass bytes array from/to different method in the SDK
eIDMW::BEID_CardAbstract base class for all the card type supported
eIDMW::BEID_CardVersionInfoClass for the info document
eIDMW::BEID_CertificateClass that represent one certificate
eIDMW::BEID_CertificatesContainer class for all certificates on the card
eIDMW::BEID_ConfigClass to access the config parameters
eIDMW::BEID_CrlClass that represents one CRL
eIDMW::BEID_CryptoAbstract base class for the cryptographic documents
eIDMW::BEID_EIdClass for the id document on a EID Card
eIDMW::BEID_EIDCardThis class represents a Belgium EID card
eIDMW::BEID_EIdFullDocClass for the full document Eid
eIDMW::BEID_ExBadTransactionException class Bad Transaction (error code = EIDMW_ERR_BAD_TRANSACTION)
eIDMW::BEID_ExBadUsageException class Bad Usage (error code = EIDMW_ERR_BAD_USAGE)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCardBadTypeException class Bad Card Type (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CARDTYPE_BAD)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCardChangedException class Card changed (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CARD_CHANGED)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCardTypeUnknownException class Card Type Unknown (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CARDTYPE_UNKNOWN)
eIDMW::BEID_ExceptionBase class for the BEID SDK Exceptions
eIDMW::BEID_ExCertNoCrlException class Certificate No CRL (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CERT_NOCRL)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCertNoIssuerException class Certificate No Issuer (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CERT_NOISSUER)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCertNoOcspException class Certificate No OCSP responder (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CERT_NOOCSP)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCertNoRootException class Certificate No OCSP responder (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CERT_NOROOT)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCmdNotAllowedException class Command Not Allowed (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CMD_NOT_ALLOWED)
eIDMW::BEID_ExCmdNotSupportedException class Command Not Supported (error code = EIDMW_ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED)
eIDMW::BEID_ExDocTypeUnknownException class Document Type Unknown (error code = EIDMW_ERR_DOCTYPE_UNKNOWN)
eIDMW::BEID_ExFileTypeUnknownException class File Type Unknown (error code = EIDMW_ERR_FILETYPE_UNKNOWN)
eIDMW::BEID_ExNoCardPresentException class No Card Present (error code = EIDMW_ERR_NO_CARD)
eIDMW::BEID_ExNoReaderException class No reader (error code = EIDMW_ERR_NO_READER)
eIDMW::BEID_ExNotAllowByUserException class Not allow by user (error code = EIDMW_ERR_NOT_ALLOW_BY_USER)
eIDMW::BEID_ExParamRangeException class Bad Parameter Range (error code = EIDMW_ERR_PARAM_RANGE)
eIDMW::BEID_ExReaderSetChangedException class Readerset changed (error code = EIDMW_ERR_READERSET_CHANGED)
eIDMW::BEID_ExReleaseNeededException class Release Needed (error code = EIDMW_ERR_RELEASE_NEEDED)
eIDMW::BEID_ExUnknownException class Release Needed (error code = EIDMW_ERR_UNKNOWN)
eIDMW::BEID_ExUserMustAnswerException class User must answer (error code = EIDMW_ERR_USER_MUST_ANSWER)
eIDMW::BEID_ForeignerCardThis class represents a Foreigner card which is a particular BEID_EIDCard
eIDMW::BEID_KidsCardThis class represents a Kids card which is a particular BEID_EIDCard
eIDMW::BEID_MemoryCardAbstract base class for Memory card
eIDMW::BEID_ObjectBase class for the object of BEID SDK (Can not be instantiated)
eIDMW::BEID_OcspResponseClass that represents one OCSP Response
eIDMW::BEID_PictureClass for the picture document on a EID Card
eIDMW::BEID_PinClass that represent one Pin
eIDMW::BEID_PinsContainer class for all pins on the card
eIDMW::BEID_RawData_EidThese structure are used for compatibility with old C sdk
eIDMW::BEID_RawData_Sis
eIDMW::BEID_ReaderContextThis class represent a reader
eIDMW::BEID_ReaderSetThis is a singleton class that is the starting point to get all other objects
eIDMW::BEID_SISCardThis class represents a SIS card
eIDMW::BEID_SisFullDocClass for the full document Sis
eIDMW::BEID_SisIdClass for the id document on a SIS Card
eIDMW::BEID_SmartCardAbstract base class for Smart card
eIDMW::BEID_XMLDocAbstract base class for all the documents
